name: vector2godot
description: Vector2Godot - Create vector shapes and generate Godot _draw() function code
author: Stefan Willoughby

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:vite" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && npm run build:vite && npm run build:electron
scripts.clean: npm run archive && npm run clean:current
scripts.archive: mkdir -p archive && if [ -d release ]; then found=false && for file in release/*.exe release/*.AppImage release/*.dmg; do if [ -f "$file" ]; then found=true && mv "$file" archive/; fi; done && if [ "$found" = true ]; then echo "Archived previous builds to archive/"; else echo "No previous builds to archive"; fi; else echo "No release folder to archive"; fi

linux.synopsis: Vector drawing app for Godot game engine
linux.description: Create vector shapes and generate Godot _draw() function code. Features drawing tools, real-time code generation, and customizable properties.

desktop.Name: Vector2Godot
desktop.Comment: Create vector shapes and generate Godot code
